subject: Horse Racing
Breeders' Cup (Horse Races)
lead_paragraph: Beholder, a 5-year-old mare, was found to have bleeding in her lung. She was the second choice behind American Pharoah for Saturday’s race.
snippet: Beholder, a 5-year-old mare, was found to have bleeding in her lung. She was the second choice behind American Pharoah for Saturday’s race.
